meanings.definition: A type of herb used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: I added some origans to the pasta sauce for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for a pinch of origans to enhance the taste.
meanings.sent3: The origans in the garden were so fragrant, they made the neighbors jealous.
meanings.sent4: The origans in the dish were like tiny bursts of freshness in every bite.
meanings.sent5: The chef's secret to delicious dishes was always using fresh origans.

meanings.definition: The act of originating or beginning.
meanings.sent1: The origans of the story were traced back to a small village.
meanings.sent2: Every project has its own unique origans that shape its outcome.
meanings.sent3: The origans of the friendship started with a shared love for music.
meanings.sent4: In the origans of time, legends were born and tales were spun.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the origans of a tradition can reveal its true meaning.

meanings.definition: A group of people or things that are similar in some way.
meanings.sent1: The origans of the team were diverse yet united in their goal.
meanings.sent2: She found comfort in the origans of like-minded individuals.
